alert.note: Alert for Harding; Perkins (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 10 at 2:38PM MST until November 10 at 6:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Winter Storm Winding Down This Afternoon... .Light snow will linger over parts of far northwestern South Dakota this afternoon with only minor additional accumulations. Gusty northerly winds will create areas of blowing snow and reduced visibilities in this area. Conditions should be notably improved by 6 pm MST. Monitor NOAA Weather Radio for the latest information, forecasts, and warnings. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of less than one inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Harding County and Perkins County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected. This will create dangerous conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
